name: Fighting Game (Mikkel)
description:
2D PVP, local multiplayer, inspired by duck game various other arcady fighting/action games.

- Controls
Player 1 - WASD to move, F to attack/confirm, G/Left-Shift to dash, Space to jump.
Player 2 - Arrow keys to move, Enter to attack/confirm, Right-Shift to dash, Right-Ctrl to jump.

- Developers
Art & level by "Lynn",
UI & level by "Krigcoopa",
Programming etc by me/"Mikkelen".
